ability_desc: Catherine gains 1 armor & shield every time she stuns or silences an enemy hero with her abilities.
Catherine gains a burst of move speed. Her next basic attack is replaced by a powerful stun attack. Resets basic attack cooldown on activation.
Activates a pulsating bubble that burns nearby enemies and deflects damage above 77 (+7 per level) to nearby enemies. Each deflection reduces the shield duration by 0.5 seconds.
Catherine slams the ground, damaging & silencing enemies in a large cone in front of her.
